name: Star Brain
overview: S.O.S., Priority: First Class From: Headquarters of republic Forces, Solar System, Planet Earth. To: B Class Pilots The Star System Alpha Centaury-B exploded Cause: Alien Lifeform attack Command: Every B-Class pilot immediately has to teleport to endanger zone. All information about alien lifeforms and the zone could be found in the Central Military Computer. Use your block gun to mirror all blocks in your path so they will dissappear and allow you further into alien space. Published in 64'er Top-Spiele #6.
